text: Silent Cinema in India - A Pictorial Journey is a 2012 Indian English language non-fiction book, written by B D Garga and published by Harper Collins India. It won the 2012 National Film Award for Best Book on Cinema ==References== Category:2012 books Category:English-language books Category:HarperCollins books Category:Best Book on Cinema National Film Award winners Category:Indian non-fiction books Category:21st-century Indian books
title: Silent Cinema in India
